thread.section_title: Trustpilot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trustpilot | www.trustpilot.com | 3 of 101
thread.title: Bill B.

author: Bill B.
title: Bill B.
text: I feel I've been tricked into receiving unwanted emails from you. I thought I was giving a review for one company - period. Now I'm being asked to review whatever I want. Please take me off your email list. Give an unsubscribe button on the emails you do send. I assume you have my email address. Please do not share my email address with any individuals, companies or any other entities.
